name: Garlic Butter Steak
description: Juicy steak with a flavorful garlic butter sauce
ingredients: ["1 lb ribeye steak", "4 cloves garlic, minced", "3 tbsp butter", "1 tbsp olive oil", "1 tsp fresh thyme leaves", "salt and pepper to taste"]
steps: ["Season steak with salt and pepper on both sides", "Heat olive oil in a cast iron skillet over high heat", "Add steak and sear for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare", "Reduce heat to medium-low, add butter, garlic, and thyme", "Spoon the garlic butter over the steak continuously for 1-2 minutes", "Remove steak, let rest for 5 minutes before slicing", "Serve with remaining garlic butter sauce"]

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce
ingredients: ["2 cups broccoli florets", "1 red bell pepper, sliced", "1 carrot, julienned", "1 cup snap peas", "1 small onion, sliced", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1 tbsp ginger, grated", "2 tbsp soy sauce", "1 tbsp sesame oil", "1 tsp cornstarch", "1/4 cup water", "1 tbsp vegetable oil"]
steps: ["Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce", "Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat", "Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant", "Add onions and stir fry for 1 minute", "Add remaining vegetables and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender", "Pour sauce over vegetables and stir until thickened, about 1 minute", "Serve hot over rice if desired"]

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Tender chicken breasts with a bright lemon herb sauce
ingredients: ["4 boneless chicken breasts", "2 lemons, juiced and zested", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "2 tbsp fresh parsley, chopped", "1 tbsp fresh rosemary, chopped", "1 tbsp fresh thyme, chopped", "2 tbsp olive oil", "1/2 cup chicken broth", "salt and pepper to taste"]
steps: ["Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper", "Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat", "Add chicken and cook for 5-6 minutes per side until golden and cooked through", "Remove chicken and set aside", "In the same skillet, add garlic and cook for 30 seconds", "Add lemon juice, zest, and chicken broth, scraping up browned bits", "Simmer for 2 minutes, then add herbs", "Return chicken to the skillet and simmer for 2 more minutes", "Serve chicken with the sauce spooned over top"]

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Colorful pasta dish loaded with fresh spring vegetables
ingredients: ["8 oz pasta (fettuccine or penne)", "1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved", "1 zucchini, sliced", "1 yellow squash, sliced", "1 red bell pepper, sliced", "1 cup broccoli florets", "1/2 cup peas", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped", "1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese", "2 tbsp olive oil", "1/4 cup heavy cream", "salt and pepper to taste"]
steps: ["Cook pasta according to package directions, reserve 1/2 cup pasta water", "Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat", "Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds until fragrant", "Add broccoli, zucchini, yellow squash, and bell pepper", "Cook for 4-5 minutes until vegetables begin to soften", "Add cherry tomatoes and peas, cook for 2 more minutes", "Stir in heavy cream and 1/4 cup pasta water", "Add drained pasta to the skillet and toss to combine", "Add more pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce", "Stir in basil and Parmesan cheese", "Season with salt and pepper to taste", "Serve immediately with additional Parmesan if desired"]

name: Beef and Broccoli
description: Classic Chinese takeout dish made at home
ingredients: ["1 lb flank steak, thinly sliced against the grain", "4 cups broccoli florets", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1 tbsp ginger, grated", "1/4 cup soy sauce", "2 tbsp brown sugar", "1 tbsp oyster sauce", "1 tbsp cornstarch", "1/4 cup water", "2 tbsp vegetable oil", "1 tsp sesame oil"]
steps: ["In a bowl, mix soy sauce, brown sugar, oyster sauce, cornstarch, and water to make the sauce", "Heat 1 tbsp vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat", "Add beef in a single layer and cook for 1 minute per side until browned", "Remove beef and set aside", "Add remaining vegetable oil to the wok", "Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant", "Add broccoli and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender", "Return beef to the wok", "Pour sauce over beef and broccoli, stir until thickened, about 1 minute", "Drizzle with sesame oil", "Serve hot over rice"]
